about_the_game:
DISCLAIMER: This playable demo is heavily in development and is missing many core features we are planning for DIESELDOME. It may have bugs and various other issues.

DIESELDOME: Oil & Blood Demo is a RomanPunk FPS with Movement Shooter and Survivors-like mechanics. In every run, you will create absurdly powerful builds against hundreds of enemies at a time while parkouring your way through the Dome.

This is an early demo that is still under development.

Will you be a petrol-powered gatling gun berserker that shoots 20 homing bullets that explode or a V8-powered auto-crossbow sniper that wall-runs, slides and triple jumps their way through their enemies?

  • A RomanPunk FPS with Survivor-Like mechanics, inspired by Vampire Survivors, ULTRAKILL, and more.

  • 3 different characters, each carrying their own unique weapon, abilities and unique upgrades.

  • 60+ unique game-changing perks that can be synergized to devastate the DieselDome.

The crowd itself determines your fate in the DIESELDOME. While you’re fighting your way through the pitiful grunts, The experienced waves of gladiators can steal the spotlight away from you by trying to capture regions. These unique warriors warped by the Empire will make it much harder for you to stand out to the crowd.

  • Unlock new skill trees and passive skills while taking risky bets using our randomly generated betting system to become a champion of the people. 

  • The Dome is split into 4 regions that you have to defend against organized waves of enemies. Losing a region can cost you the favor of the crowd.

  • Face 7+ abominations, made living by the Empire such as the Phalanx Tank or eagles experimented into being fighter planes.

When in Rome, parkour like the Romans do. Thanks to modern Imperial technology, your body is an unstoppable engine of flesh. Mobility is life in the Dome and by the Emperor, you can move like a V8-powered chariot!

  • Parkour your way to glory by wall-running, sliding, quad-jumping, and more.

  • Through perks, glide like Mercury, grenade-boost to battle, and Grapple-Hook your way of a sticky situation.

  • The environment itself is both a tool and an adversary. The machinery and platforms of the arena can help you traverse the Dome like an eagle; If you have the skills for it.

This demo version contains:

  • A RomanPunk FPS with Survivors-Like and Movement Shooter mechanics.

  • 3 different characters each carrying their own unique weapon, ability and upgrades. 

  • 60+ unique abilities that can be synergized.

  • Parkour mechanics including wall-running, gliding, quadruple jumping, jump-slamming, and more.

  • A map inspired by the 2000s era of FPS games, with 4 uniquely themed regions that were hand-crafted to be parkoured. 

  • A region-capturing system that rewards or punishes the player, resulting in an eternal tug-of-war between you and the enemy hordes.

  • Skill trees, passive skills, and unique character upgrades.

  • A randomly generated betting system to earn gold.

  • Face 7+ enemies.

content_descriptors.notes: DIESELDOME: Oil & Blood Demo contains graphic violence and gore.

name: DIESELDOME: Oil & Blood Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or +
  • Processor: Intel i5-12400F
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1650
  • Storage: 3500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: DieselDome: Oil & Blood DEMO is a FPS with movement shooter and Survivors-like mechanics. In every run, you will create absurdly powerful builds against hundreds of enemies at a time while facing the judgment of the crowd. It takes place in an original RomanPunk universe.
